interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ODINSON Messy Bun Hair Piece for Women Updo Hair Bun
Review Date: 2022/05/26
Store: ODINSON
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human, Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ODINSON', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 5.2 x 1.61 inches; 4.97 Ounces'}
Review Text: My hair is very hard to match is black…but not the darkest black that is available. It is more what they call off black. I ordered the brown black, but it was a very dark black with little to no brown. It was too dark to look at all natural for me. It is a nice hairpiece…I just seem to wear different colors in different brands. I have a very small amount of gray/white mostly from a brain surgery. This pic is fairly true to color, though the piece is so dark that my hair looks brown-which it definitely isn’t. If your hair is really dark, the black/brown just might work for you.
Review Title: Nice..but doesn’t match
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made
QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
QTMY
['QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5.51 x 1.69 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Very  beautiful.

These are very pretty but very thin. The glue on the back of them is super sticky and a mess to clean off your fingers. I don’t recommend these. I use a different brand that can last up to a week, but these peeked of within about two days. Not all the great to cut and file, either. I was not happy with them, I do not recommend. The color was beautiful though.
Very thin.

These are really cute, and they are a great size for a variety of looks. I really like hair clips…some are far too big to use for anything but all of ones hair and you must have a lot. These are a nice medium size, great colors, and really adorable.

Fairly nice
Maforsoon Messy Hair Bun Hair Scrunchies Extension 1PCS Curly Wavy Messy Synthetic Chignon for women Updo (Strawberry Blonde)
Maforsoon
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Maforsoon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7.56 x 6.65 x 1.42 inches; 2.08 Ounces'}
When ordering go by the pictures, not the actual written description. I figured dark brown would be dark brown, but if you click on dark brown you get a picture of a light red. That is what you will get. These are cute, but they aren’t worth the $10. You can see the wrapping of the ponytail. I wanted to order one that was the right color, but the price is too high for the quality.
Disappointing…dark brown is reddish color.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to prioritize unique and aesthetically pleasing hair accessories while becoming increasingly discerning about quality. Her recent experiences with hair-related products highlight the necessity for accurate color representation, as she has faced challenges matching shades to her own hair.

- **User Engagement:** She values durability, performance, and comfort but is now critically evaluating product descriptions and color accuracy. This shift reflects a proactive commitment to providing feedback based on her experiences.

- **Performance Consideration:** With a strong focus on secure fitting products for thin hair, the user emphasizes comfort and lightweight options. Her recent interactions indicate an amplified demand for reliable products that meet her quality standards.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** The search for versatile items continues for both her and her daughter, with a keen interest in functionality alongside aesthetics.

- **Color Variety:** While she appreciates vibrant colors, the importance of precise color representation is now a significant factor in her evaluations, showcasing a clear preference for products that match her specific hair tone.

- **Family Orientation:** The user remains focused on multifunctional beauty products serving both her and her daughter, striving for practicality that complements her beauty interests.

Overall, the user's journey reflects a balance between her passion for beauty and a heightened vigilance toward quality and color accuracy, ensuring her purchases consistently align with her elevated standards.
